channel.title: Compression - Run Length Encoding :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script In this module, we will spend a lot of time talking about compression and error checking in our computers. We’ve already talked about compression a little bit in the data encoding module earlier this semester. But now we’re going to spend an entire module talking about just these two topics. First, we’re going to talk about in compression. What do you think compression is and why do you think it’s useful?
